attributes.action: make MPs accountable for their actions,decisions and mistakes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: when most people make mistakes or lie or are incompetent they are sacked,this should apply to MPs and im sure they would take more care then

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
